Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 避开她们并从门逃脱，她们总是站在门旁边。
English(en): Avoid Them and escape through doors.They always stand next to the door.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 翻开所有敌人卡牌来抓住他
English(en): Reveal all enemy cards to catch him

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 在相邻格子上召唤敌人，用提灯照射他三次来阻止他
English(en): Summons enemies to adjacent tiles. Dazzle him three times to stop it

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 翻开它消耗1点生命值和所有礼物
English(en): Revealing it costs 1 HP and all Gifts
Ring it to go to the next level

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 用它来翻开敌人以眩晕他
English(en): Use it to reveal an enemy to dazzle him
Revealed at the start of the level

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 揭示一个随机相邻的安全格子
English(en): Reveals a random adjacent safe tile

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 如果有未揭示的敌人相邻会报警
English(en): Alert if any unrevealed enemy adjcent to it

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 获得一个护盾来防止下一个敌人
English(en): Get a Shield to prevent next enemy

Key: You saved Chirstmas! Thanks for playing!
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你拯救了圣诞节！感谢游玩！
English(en): You saved Chirstmas! Thanks for playing!

Key: Click bell to enter next level
English(en): Click bell to enter next level

Key: Drag light to tiles that may have enemies to dazzle them
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 将提灯拖到可能有敌人的格子上以眩晕它们
English(en): Drag the lantern to tiles that may have enemies to dazzle them

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当前: {0}\n未翻开: {1}\n金币用于购买物品。
English(en): Current: {0}\nUnrevealed: {1}\nCoins are used to purchase items.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当前: {0}\n未翻开: {1}\n礼物在商店中转换为金币。敌人会偷取礼物。
English(en): Current: {0}\nUnrevealed: {1}\nGifts convert to coins in the shop. Enemies steal gifts.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当前生命值: {0}\n进入商店时恢复1点。
English(en): Current Health: {0}\nRestore 1 when entering the shop.

Key: You saved Christmas! Thanks for playing!
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你拯救了圣诞节！感谢游玩！
English(en): You saved Christmas! Thanks for playing!

Key: You successfully passed this level! The adventure continues!
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你成功通过了这一关！冒险继续！
English(en): You successfully passed this level! The adventure continues!

Key: {diff:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on left than on right
English(en): {0:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on left than on right

English(en): {0:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on right than on left

Key: Same number of enemies on the left and right sides
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 左右两侧敌人数量相同
English(en): Same number of enemies on the left and right sides

Key: {diff:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on top than on bottom
English(en): {0:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on top than on bottom

Key: {diff:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on bottom than on top
English(en): {0:plural:{} more enemy|{} more enemies} on bottom than on top

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 上下两侧敌人数量相同

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 教堂附近{0:cond:=0?没有敌人|有{}个敌人}

Key: The largest group of enemy is {maxGroupSize}
English(en): The largest group of enemy is {0}

English(en): No enemies are adjacent to each other

Key: Switching language will restart the game. Do you want to continue?
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 切换语言将重新开始游戏。是否继续？
English(en): Switching language will restart the game. Do you want to continue?

Key: Switching language will restart the game. Do you want to continue?
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 切换语言将重新开始游戏。是否继续？
English(en): Switching language will restart the game. Do you want to continue?

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 眩晕一个敌人获得+1金币
当你敲响铃铛时，每个已揭示的敌人给予+1礼物
English(en): When you ring the bell, each revealed enemy grants +1 Gift

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 敲响铃铛揭示所有与教堂相邻的敌人
English(en): Ringing the bell reveals all enemies adjacent to the Church

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 连续揭示4个安全格子获得+1礼物
English(en): Revealing 4 safe tiles in a row grants +1 Gift

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 在每个关卡开始时揭示一个随机的提示
English(en): At the start of each level, reveal a random Hint

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 揭示最后一个安全格子获得+2金币
English(en): Revealing the last safe tile grants +2 Coin

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当生命值为1时，所有获得的礼物翻倍
English(en): While at 1 HP, all Gifts gained are doubled

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 照亮一个安全格子也会揭示一个相邻的安全格子
English(en): Lighting a safe tile also reveals one adjacent safe tile

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 揭示所有格子恢复1点生命值
在没有提灯的情况下揭示敌人也会揭示一个相邻的安全格子
English(en): Revealing an enemy without Lantern also reveals an adjacent safe tile

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 如果你有提灯，携带1个提灯到下一关
English(en): Carry 1 Lantern to the next level if you have any

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 提灯会保留在格子上到下一关，该格子上不会生成敌人
English(en): Lantern will keep on the tile to next level, grinch would not be generated on it

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当开始一个关卡时，如果有敌人在可揭示的格子中会通知你
English(en): when start a level, will notify if there is grinch in revealable tiles

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
那是圣诞前夜，所有人都坐在长椅上
人们等待唱诗班的歌唱
在他们中间是卡罗尔
穿着她的唱诗班服装
还有一条鲜红色的围巾
English(en):
It was the night before Christmas, and all were in their pews
Folks waited for the choir to sing a song or two
And among them was Carol
In her choir apparel 
And a scarf of a bright red hue

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔对其他人感到非常无聊\n所以她的眼睛和思绪开始游荡。
English(en): Carol was very bored by those beyond her\nSo her eyes and mind began to wander.
She was shocked to have found.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
在教堂的后面，他站在那里
卡罗尔可以看出他不怀好意
他有黑色的毛皮和角
还有像荆棘一样锋利的牙齿
English(en):
At the back of the church, there he stood
And Carol could tell he was up to no good
He had dark fur and horns
And teeth as sharp as thorns

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 他正在做没有人应该做的事
English(en): And he was doing what no person should
From the lights to the tree

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 最糟糕的是\n这一切就发生在他们的眼皮底下\n他怎么能拿走一切，却没有人注意到
English(en): And the worst part\nIt was happening right under their noses\nHow could he take everything, and nobody notice

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
当然，除了卡罗尔没有人看到
她看到了这一切
她必须阻止这个可恶的人
只有她有这个胆量。
English(en):
Nobody except Carol, of course
She saw it all
She had to stop this nasty man
Only she had the gawl.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 所以那个可恶的人跑了\n卡罗尔制定了一个计划
English(en): So the nasty man ran\nAnd Carol made a plan

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔跑过教堂的地板\n她刚到一扇门旁\n修女砰地一声把门打开
English(en): Carol ran through the church floor\nAnd she stood by a door\nWhen the nun SLAMED it open more

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔快速逃离她们\n找到一扇新门然后\n她们又一次砰地关上了门
English(en): Carol ran fast from them\nFound a new door and then\nThey slammed it once again

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 凯伦修女\n既严格又刻薄\n她总是站在门旁边，阻挠想要溜走的小孩
English(en): Sister Karen\nWas strict and mean and\nShe always right by the door

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔已经摆脱了凯伦修女\n大概……
English(en): Carol had lost Sister Karen \nas far as she could tell

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 就在这时她注意到地板上的什么东西
English(en): That's when she noticed something on the floor

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 其中一个被偷的金色铃铛
English(en): One of the stolen golden bells

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 在她敲响它之后\n它揭示了一条穿过教堂门的路
English(en): It revealed a path through the church door\nAfter she gave it a ring

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 这条路射入并弯曲进入黑暗的树林\n所以卡罗尔尽可能勇敢地走了过去\n只希望那里没有潜伏什么东西。
English(en): The path shot and curved into the dark woods\nSo Carol followed as brave as she could\nJust hope there's nothing lurking.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔被一个雪人逼到了角落
English(en): Carol was cornered by a snow man
There was nowhere for her to go

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 就在这时她有了一个\n聪明的想法
English(en): That's when she got\nThe clever idea

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 她把圣诞灯插进他的鼻子\n这时雪人的鼻子开始发光
English(en): To stick Christmas lights up his nose\nThats when the snowman's nose started to glow

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 雪人从愤怒变成了困惑\n只是抠着鼻子，摇晃着。\n
English(en): The snowman went from mad to more confused\nJust picking at his nose, shaking it about.\n

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔说在女孩面前抠鼻子是不礼貌的
English(en): Carol said it's impolite to pick your nose in front of a girl

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 雪人感到尴尬然后走开了
English(en): And the snowman got embarrassed before he walked out

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔转身再次敲响了铃铛
English(en): Carol turned and rang the bell once more

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 它通向一个黑暗的洞穴\n就是这样，她会拿回那些礼物\n她走进去，试图勇敢起来。
English(en): And it led into a dark cave\nThis was it, shed get back those gifts\nShe went in and tried to be brave.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
卡罗尔找到了货物！
她高兴得想放声歌唱。
直到她看见那个男人在舔他的战利品，
她大喊道：“你的圣诞节过错啦！”
English(en):
Carol had found the Goods!
She was so happy she could sing a song
That's until she saw the man licking a sled
She shouted "YOURE DOING CHRISTMAS WRONG!"

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卡罗尔立刻冲向他。\n“你不能吃那个天使头饰！”她说道。\n“这比任何罪行都严重！”
English(en): Carol ran towards him in no time.\n"YOU CAN'T EAT THE ANGEL TOPPER" she said.\n"THATS WORSE THAN ANY CRIME"

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
“你难道对圣诞节一无所知吗？”
那个邋遢的男人耸了耸肩表示否定。
他确实不知道，
他并不是什么节日大盗，
只是个圣诞新手。
English(en):
"Dont you know about christmas at all?"
And the nasty man shrugged no
He didn't know truly
He wasn't some holiday thief 
The man was just a christmas newbie

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
于是她把他拽回了教堂：
“我要让你看看圣诞节该怎么过！”
他们蹑手蹑脚地归还了所有赃物，
再次瞒过了所有人的眼睛。
English(en):
So she dragged him back to the church
"ILL SHOW YOU HOW CHRISTMAS GOES"
And they stealthily returned all that was stolen
Once again under everyone's nose.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 他们大摇大摆地走入了人群，\n甚至还有时间加入唱诗班一起歌唱。
English(en): They walked in like they belonged\nEven had had timeTo sing with the choir

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 当卡罗尔够不到那个天使头饰时，\n那个（不那么）邋遢的男人将她高高举起。
English(en): And when carol couldn't reach to put back the angel topper\nThe Not so nasty man was to lift her higher

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
这就是他们的圣诞节：
尴尬的开始，完美的结局。
这是一个古老而永恒的故事。
圣诞快乐！
感谢游玩，
期待与你再次相遇。
English(en):
And so that was their christmas
An awkward start but great end
But that's a tale as old as time.
Merry Christmas! 
Thanks for playing
Until we meet again.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 街道很安静。\n点击高亮的格子揭示它。
English(en): The streets are quiet.\nClick a highlighted tile to move forward and reveal what waits there.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 小心敌人。\n如果你在没有提灯的情况下遇到他们，他们会攻击你，你所有的礼物都会丢失。
English(en): Beware the enemy.\nIf you meet them without Lantern, they will attack, and all your gifts will be lost.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你找到了一个提灯。\n使用它，然后点击一个未揭示的格子来眩晕隐藏在那里的任何敌人
English(en): You found a Lantern.\nUse it, then click an unrevealed tile to dazzle any enemy hiding there

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你找到了铃铛。\n敲响它来结束这个夜晚并继续前进。或者继续探索，如果你敢的话。
English(en): You found the Bell.\nRing it to end the night and move on.Or keep exploring, if you dare.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 片刻的温暖。\n在这里休息可以恢复1点生命值，并在夜晚再次开始前交易你攒下的东西。
English(en): A moment of warmth.\nRest here to heal 1 HP, and trade what you've saved before the night begins again.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 根据提示，敌人可能在这里，也许尝试翻开安全的格子。
English(en): According to the hint, enemies are probably here, maybe try flip tiles that are safe.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 所有物品都已收集，你可以点击铃铛继续前进。
English(en): All Items are collected, you can click the bell to move on.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 根据提示，敌人可能在这里，也许尝试翻开安全的格子。
English(en): According to the hint, enemies are probably here, maybe try flip tiles that are safe.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 点击左下角的提灯，然后点击这里的格子，以避免潜在的伤害。
English(en): Click on the lantern on left bottom, then click tiles here, to avoid potential damage.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 在卡罗尔上方的格子上使用提灯，那里有潜在的危险。
English(en): Use the lantern on tiles above Carol, which has potential danger there.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 已达到上限，出售已有升级项以购买新的

English(en): All save data has been cleared.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 点击修女图标继续逃跑！(剩余{0}扇门)
English(en): Click the Nun icon to keep running! ({0} door left)

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 你从修女手下逃走了！点击修女图标离开这里。
English(en): You escaped from the nun! Click the Nun icon to Leave this place.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 他被眩晕了一下，再来一次！(剩余{0}次)\n点击雪人图标继续追赶他。
你必须用提灯来眩晕他！点击雪人图标继续追赶他。
English(en): You have to use light to dazzle him! Click the Snowman icon to keep chasing him.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 再揭示他一次！(剩余{0}次)\n点击怪人图标继续追赶他。
English(en): Reveal him one more time!({0} time left)\n Click the monster icon to keep chasing him.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 确定要加载新关卡吗？\n\n当前进度将会丢失。
English(en): Are you sure you want to load a new level?\n\nYour current progress will be lost.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans):
确定要清除所有存档数据吗？

这将删除：
- 所有游戏进度
- 所有教程记录
- 所有故事解锁
- 所有系统设置

此操作无法撤销。
English(en):
Are you sure you want to clear all save data?

This will delete:
- All game progress
- All tutorials
- All stories
- All settings

This action cannot be undone.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 确定要返回主菜单吗？\n\n当前进度将会丢失。
English(en): Are you sure you want to return to the main menu?\n\nYour current progress will be lost.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 确定要重新开始当前关卡吗？\n\n当前进度将会丢失。
English(en): Are you sure you want to restart the current level?\n\nYour current progress will be lost.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 切换语言需要重启游戏。是否继续？
English(en): Switching language will restart the game. Do you want to continue?

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 治疗溢出时，转化为等量金币
卖出价格为0，卖出时：金币翻倍
English(en): Sell price is 0. Sell: Double your Coin

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 揭示铃铛或出口：礼物转为金币
English(en): Reveal Bell or Exit: Convert Gifts to Gold

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 卖出时：揭示并眩晕一名敌人
English(en): Sell: Reveal and dazzle a random enemy

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 受到致命伤时，移除这个升级项并恢复一点血
English(en): Prevent a fatal hit: Consume this to heal 1 HP

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 若翻开的首格是敌人：礼物+2，回 1 血
English(en): First revealed tile is enemy: +2 Gifts and heal 1 HP

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 离开商店且未购买：金币+3
卖出时：揭示场上所有提示
卖掉其他升级项时：获得1金币
English(en): Gain 1 Coin when selling other upgrades

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 购买获 10 金币，卖出需付 15 金币
受到致命伤时，若有 10 金币则消耗金币并免伤
English(en): Spend 10 Gold to prevent a fatal hit

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 购买时：耗尽金币，回复 1 血
English(en): Buy: Lose all Gold, heal 1 HP.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-Hans): 购买时：消耗 1 血，获得 5 金币
